contentLists.heading: What is cross platform mobile app development?
contentLists.content: Cross platform app development involves the use of one code to develop and deploy across multiple platforms. i.e. Skype, Alibaba, Facebook, Slack, etc.

contentLists.heading: Can I migrate my existing native app to cross platform?
contentLists.content: Yes, why not! Techtic have a skilled and experienced cross platform app developer’s team who can easily building and migrate your existing native app into cross platform app within a specific period.

contentLists.heading: What steps are followed for cross platform app development process by your company?
contentLists.content:
Our cross platform app development process:

  • Phase I – Kickoff Meeting
  • Phase II – Project Management & Resource Allocation.
  • Phase III – Mockup Design
  • Phase IV – Agile Development – Programming& Quality Assurance
  • Phase VII – Final Deployment

contentLists.heading: What is the difference between a native app & a cross-platform app?
contentLists.content: Applications that are designed and built for one particular mobile operating system are termed as a native app. Cross platform apps are the opposites of native apps. Unlike native apps, cross-platform app development involves the use of one code to develop and deploy across multiple platforms.

contentLists.heading: Which technologies and tools used for cross platform app development?
contentLists.content:
We deal in below listed design and development frameworks, Tools, and IDEs.

  • Cross-Platform App Development Frameworks: 1. React Native, 2. Ionic, 3. Flutter, 4. Xamarin
  • Mobile Payment Tools: 1. Braintree, 2. Stripe
  • Push Notification Tools: 1. Pusher, 2. Firebase

contentLists.heading: How much does it cost to develop a cross platform app?
contentLists.content: The development cost of cross platform application is totally depends upon on the requirements of the project. To know the exact details of the cost to develop a cross platform app, get in touch with us to get estimated budget-friendly pricing or you can email us at info@techtic.com.

contentLists.heading: How much time does it require to build a cross platform app?
contentLists.content: To be honest, it depends. It depends upon the size of your cross platform app development project and factors like integration, features, and functionalities you want to have in your cross platform application. To precisely understand in-detail please, you can email us your project requirement at info@techtic.com or directly get in touch us today.

contentLists.heading: Which methodologies and tools do you use for cross platform project management?
contentLists.content:
We are using Agile project development methodology for meeting deadlines. Meanwhile, we also use cutting-edge project management tools to monitor and manage every phase of cross-platform app development.

  • Jira

  • Slack

contentLists.heading: Is there any process you follow to keep my cross platform app idea confidential?
contentLists.content: Yes, we sign NDA agreement for keep your cross platform app idea confidential.
